text:
You cannot set the filename of a file you attach to an arbitrary one. 
This means if you are attaching from a URL say with some parameters, you 
get a pretty nasty filename.  I have made the necessary changes for this, 
along with fixing bug 34786, and introducing a further set of features which 
allows for having text and html multi part emails (will be in the next report, 
along with patches for all three)
creator: pete.storey@kisstechnologies.co.uk
